idea-plugin.name: Axon Framework Plugin
idea-plugin.description: This plugin helps to navigate from and to the axon framework event handler annotations. Axon Framework helps build scalable, extensible and maintainable applications by supporting developers apply the Command Query Responsibility Segregation (CQRS) architectural pattern. Please report issues at http://issues.axonframework.org
